name: Xevious 3D/G
overview:
Xevious 3D/G (ゼビウス 3D/G) is a shoot 'em up arcade game that was released by Namco in April 1996 only in Japan. It was later ported to the PlayStation in 1997 as Xevious 3D/G+.

This is the 4th title in the Xevious series. It changes from the 2D format of the original to a 3D environment. The game starts off with the same viewpoint as the original, but later the camera is positioned above/behind the ship looking towards the action.
